job.title: Machine Learning Engineer- Applied Statistics
job.description: truveta is a new company led by our vision saving lives with data our mission is to drive innovation in patient care and development of new therapies we are driven by staunchly held principles we are in service to patients and their best possible outcomes patient privacy is paramount and scientific integrity is essentialltbrgtltbrgtin truveta we believe that artificial intelligence will play a critical role in accomplishing our mission towards saving lives with data an important component of this work is building deep intelligence and making it available to clinical researchers and medical community overall in accelerating building high quality equitable solutionsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtthis opportunityltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtwe are building a trove of quality healthcare data suitable for medical research and advancing health knowledge this is an exciting and enormously challenging endeavor where rigorous scientific practice must be blended with robust cloud engineering technology specifically in the areas of real world data and real world evidence as well as results about the potential risk or benefits of a medical treatment or practice using these results to complement or guide clinical experiments can significantly accelerate improvements in therapies and procedures if you are drawn to work in this space and have a background in applied statistics data science or computational biology we invite you to join usltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtresponsibilitiesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtworking with large clinical datasets applying your knowledge of population statistics estimation comparative analysis on realworld health data to generate insights that broaden our understanding of patients diseases and care pathwaysltligtltligtyour work will empower data scientists medical researchers and power published life science dashboardsltligtltligta firm grounding in statistics and data science theory and practice is requiredltligtltligtyou will apply computational statistics and data tools and techniques in a production operational environment with data sets that are updated on a daily or hourly basisltligtltligtability to interpret and evaluate different analysis approaches from the standpoint of accuracy and feasibilityltligtltligteffective communication when discussing your domain with fellow data scientists and nonscientists alikeltligtltligtwhile not essential exposure to quantitative medical research whether through clinical trials or observational studies is beneficialltligtltligtbeyond using data science tools like r and python familiarity with building high quality fast reusable software components is helpfulltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtkey qualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtbachelors or graduate degree in computer science data science ml engineering applied statistics or applied mathltligtltligt years experience in data analyses using python r scala java or similar data languageltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtwhy truveta ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtbe a part of building something special now is the perfect time to join truveta we have strong established leadership with decades of success we are wellfunded we are building a culture that prioritizes people and their passions across personal professional and everything in between join us as we build an amazing company togetherltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtwe offerltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtinteresting and meaningful work for every career stage ltligtltligtcompetitive compensation ltligtltligtcomprehensive benefits with strong medical dental and vision insurance plans ltligtltligtk plan ltligtltligtprofessional development for continuous learning ltligtltligtworklife autonomy via flexible work hours and flexible paid time off ltligtltligtgenerous parental leave ltligtltligtregular team activities virtual and inperson as soon as we are able ltbrgtltligtltulgttruveta is proud to be an equal employment opportunity employer we do not discriminate based upon race religion color national origin gender including pregnancy childbirth or related medical conditions sexual orientation gender identity gender expression age status as a protected veteran status as an individual with a disability or other applicable legally protected characteristics
